description: This file contains CSS styles for a theme management system in a web application, defining light and dark theme colors, styling for application components, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container, including text alignment, background color, and animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including background color, layout, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including position, colors, and hover effects.
